[i]Edit: Further worsened. I can't physically play half the games I enter because players are teleporting around as the game tells me I have <30ms server ping yet the server plays like a peer-to-peer network that can't keep track of where everyone is.

Hit detection is arbitrary and sometimes takes a second to acknowledge it occurred. You won't know why you were hit from a mile away and then missed when your window vault was in the killer's swing. The Huntress is unplayable due to her ranged attack relying on careful observation of movement that the server itself can't keep track of.

There is now a £7.50 battle pass you cannot complete without daily play.

You can also earn lore. The writing is just "Character has a problem" for five paragraphs in a row without a story, replace problem with addiction, being away with the faeries, or a bad father for all current lore.

Original review, still appropriate:[/i]
Always unbalanced, no matchmaking, grind, pay to access meta content, terrible community, very good graphics, many bugs and addictive. There's too much to describe in one review; please read a lot of the critical ones before purchasing.

Played a lot and had fun, and had a lot of not fun. Described as a salt mine by its internet communities and [b]you'll be described in various expletives, slurs and degrading remarks by its playerbase at the end of each match no matter what you do.[/b] There is a report system but no-one knows if it's connected to anything.

To win you must learn many special rules, muscle memory, that most content isn't viable and that some meta content is DLC.

Matchmaking is based on a broken ranking system. There are good and bad players at every rank. [b]Losing to better players isn't fun, beating terrible players isn't fun. Teabags, showboating and the end of match chat ruin fun matches.[/b]

To unlock a build, let alone a meta one, requires RNG grinding for no purpose. [b]Do not edit your files to skip the grind, you will be banned.[/b]

Updates are usually large. There's normally a DLC, don't buy on day one because if it's strong it'll be nerfed into the ground. Bugfixes are included but bugs are introduced. If any of these new bugs are real exploits [b]you will be banned for usage whilst the developer takes months to fix them.[/b]

Bringing criticism to the official developer community will result in officials telling you you're bad at the game. Most game statistics or developer-player communication appears to be at the developer's discretion, especially in explaining why your DLC you paid for was nerfed. The developers never share balance plans or reasoning.

Okay price for a party game as the kill your friends mode has no grind, just don't play to win but to have fun [i]and definitely don't play online.[/i]

Il gioco è stupendo, giocare da survivor mette a dura prova i tuoi nervi e giocare da killer è dannatamente divertente. Le mappe son fatte molto bene e garantiscono un'ottima esperienza di gioco. Ha solo un difetto che vorrei evidenziare, e vale solo per chi acquista il DLC Stranger Things. La mappa del laboratorio di hawkins è sbagliata. Rivolgo questo appello da parte mia e dei miei amici che giocano con me: Vi prego, modificatela. Giocare da survivor è di una difficoltà immane, quasi ogni generatore ha 2/3 corvi vicini, il che ti rende individuabile molto facilmente, scappare dal killer è quasi impossibile perchè non ci sono vie di fuga, i corridoi sono pieni di porte chiuse e vicoli ciechi, senza contare il piano di sopra che presenta una finestra e un buco per scappare, il resto sono 6 stanze minuscole chiuse, non dando la corretta interazione fra killer e survivor, dato che il primo ne esce sempre vincitore. Rendetela più giocabile e interattiva per favore. Per il resto, il gioco è stupendo e non presenta pecche.

Good game. 
My only complaint is when people rage and disconnect before the games over. It screws you out of getting certain achievements if you're the killer, and makes it harder for your team to survive. I'm not great at the game, but if I play a hard killer I accept my fate, and learn from it. Maybe even spectate my teammates if they are an experienced player. 
Anyway, if you play this just respect that if a persons good at the game, it doesn't mean you aren't or can't be good. It just means they have more practice. Same for playing against experienced survivors. Sometimes they are a well coordinated team with mics and sometimes they are all easy prey. 
ANYWAY just have fun, and learn from your losses and this game is an easy buy. Especially if there's a sale (like now.)

Top demais. Vale totalmente a compra.
O estilo de jogo é inovador e faz com que a sobrevivência dependa da equipe (ou não, caso opte por jogar sozinho) mas sempre mais vantajoso trabalhar cooperativo, e geralmente os jogadores optam por ajudar. É rico em detalhes e os personagens muito bem construídos, bem como as habilidades e mapas. Díficil de enjoar no entanto seria interessante novos modos/eventos.

É difícil opinar se o jogo favorece sobrevivente ou assassino, mas realmente a habilidade e leitura de mapa do jogador que faz a diferença, sendo a experiência fator de vitória. Continua sendo muito bem cuidado pela equipe e vale completamente a aquisição

TL;DR: The best horror "hide and seek" game you can possibly play. 
Graphics: 8
Sound: 9
Gameplay: 9

---------
Long review (for the people that still reads):

The game really surprised me. Revived the horror love that was buried inside me with a great and fun mechanics. 
It's a hard game to master, but an easy game to begin with. You can really know nothing and suck at most of it, and still survive or sacrifice a survivor.

The graphics are good, illumination is fair even running on low end machines, and doesn't ruin the game that much (as most of the games does) in a competitive way. The house-made characters are unique and very interesting, as well as the killers. They are much interesting and well done as the licensed ones, so you can tell the effort and love the studio puts on every character is the same for free and paid content.

The sounds of the game are great. Horror games really depends on how the sounds will do their job, and on DBD the job is done. It really makes you feel tense and anxious (although we know that isn't good for health..you can manage that).

The gameplay is easy for beginners. It's quite simple and just requires you to understand the basics of First person and Third person games. Yet, once you understand the basics, the game presents you to a room of N possibilities, which makes you feel interested to know more of the details and git gud at everything you do.
The matchmaking isn't the best, so you can play with people much more experienced than you and get rekt, but in general works fine.

The number of combinations of gameplay you can do with a character is really what made me get addicted to this game. You can literally do whatever build you want and plan strategies that can be countered or not by adversaries, and since the RNG for the map buildings exists, every game will not be the same ever.

I really do recommend this game if you like the horror theme and stealth/hide and seek/coop mechanics.

This is one of the best horror games on steam it is very fun to get chased by the killer and escape by the skin of your teeth and also a fun experience to chase survivors as killers. But it isn't a perfect game there's broken survivor and killer perks and there are mories with make you able to kill the survivors instantly when you down them and they've been hooked 1 time. I would recommend this game if you love 1970-2020 horror movies or shows. there's alot of killers and survivors from classic movies such as: Halloween, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, A Nightmare On Elm Street and more. Overall a pretty good game would reccomend

개미친똥게임 아시아 유럽 아메리카 이런 서버구분도 없어서 한국인에게 러시아부터 세계구경시켜주는 갓게임 핑500에서 게임해보쉴? 아 물론 아시아 초록 30핑짜리도 잡히긴하죠. 근데 10랭넘어가잖아? 없어 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 하다못해 100짜리 200에서라도 게임할려고 해도 응 빨핑, 5분뒤에 응 빨핑, 5분뒤에 응 빨핑, 개쓰레기게임. 예전에 사둔거라 가끔씩 했는데 생존자 퍽이나 살인마 퍽도 돈을 조오오오온나게 갈아넣어야되고 퍽모으기 개빡셈 니가 현질해서 캐릭터 산다음에 남는 죠스바로 상점가서 전승퍽 사도 응 조또안줘 진짜 여러가지 문제가 많지만 요새들어서 매칭이 진짜 씨발이라서 게임 못한다. 11시부터 1시까지 2시간 했는데 200짜리도 없고 300은 자주 나오고 가끔 4,500짜리 러시아인지 어딘지 개같은 동네 잡힘. 니가 예지력이 있어서 0.5초뒤를 예상할 수 있다면 그냥 하고 꼬우면 해외가서 살던가 이 수준의 수준 낮은 게임. 그리고 버그도 빼놓을 수 없다. 랭초하고 10랭에서 생존자 멈춤. 방이 안잡혀서 시발. 살인마? 밸런스는 생존자가 압도적으로 퍽 좋음. 절.대.사.지.마

"DBD" をプレイすることは、虐待的な関係にあるようなものです。本当に良い時期があります。あなたはそれらを思い出すことができます。彼らはとても楽しかったです。しかし、時が経つにつれ、このゲームをプレイすることが自分だけでなく、周りのすべての人を不幸にすることに気づきます。それは、人々が故意にゲームを嫌いながらもそれをプレイする、ある種の奇妙な煉獄です。まるで彼らが彼らのシステムか何かからDBDを振り払うことができないかのように。これらは、DBDが提供するループにしっかりと参加している人々です。それはあなたを引き留めるのにちょうど十分なものをあなたに与えます、しかしあなたはあなたがそれをずっと嫌っている程度をしっかりと知っています。それはあなたを止めますか？おそらくそうではありません。虐待へようこそ。これをプレイする前にあなたの時間を再考してください、私はあなたの時間のより良い支出があることをあなたに約束します

バージョン3.4時点

ゲーム性は非常に良い。
ただ、マップがサバイバー有利な生成になっていて、
多くのキラーは非常に厳しい。
最近はナースやスピリットなど
強キラーのナーフが入っているが、
徒歩キラーの上方修正がないため
キラーはどうやっても通電する。
またランク評価がかなり厳しいので、
高ランク帯には3種類のキラーしかいない。
サバイバーの煽りやvcptも多く、
キラーをやるのはかなりのストレスが溜まる。
反対にサバイバーは非常に楽しい。
運営もサバイバー有利の調整をしている為、
これからさらに悪化していきそう。
今から新しく始めるのは絶対にお勧めしない。
사람들 똥겜이라고 했던거 사실 다 갓겜이었습니다.

WHAT I THINK OF DEAD BY DAYLIGHT?
Dead by daylight has to be the best asymmetric horror game made to date, with great lore of the game which is getting bigger and bigger all the time, with the release of the archives
which has also improved the game much adding story and so much cosmetics.
I also love that every non licensed character is free to get with iridescent shards and also perks can be unlocked in the shrine so that people don't have to use real money.
Dead by daylight is getting better and better the creators really doing so much to this game big things and little things.  
I also love that there is a grind to this game with ranks, devotion and prestige. 
The game has come a long way since 2016 adding archives, killers, survivors, dedicated servers and much more.

WHAT ABOUT THE GRAPHICS?
So the games graphics aren't best in the world but with the recent update to the engine the game does look slightly better. 
The most recent update to the game they reworked the lerrys map and that map looks so much better also the new chapter 15 coming soon the new map looks so good 
so graphics are improving much much more.

WHAT ABOUT THE COMMUNITY?
Well the community of dead by daylight are interesting bunch, you got most of your survivor mains that just complain about everything to do with killers then the other half don't,
you got most of your killer mains that that complain about survivors and the others don't, so basically the game is really unbalanced for both sides.
From my time of playing this game as killer and survivor the community can be a really toxic place, but at times it can be nice so there are nice people out there.
Also the devs really like to get involved with the community giving out codes, doing raffles and more.

PROS TO DEAD BY DAYLIGHT?
Its fun
Lots of content 
requires some skill 
licensed content
variety of different play styles
events
Cool customization
addicting game

CONS OF DEAD BY DAYLIGHT?
slightly toxic community
Ranking system is bad
Balance of the game
Meta never changes much
not really that scary
high ping
some old bugs still around

SHOULD I NOT GET THIS GAME BECAUSE OF BAD REVIEWS?
No you should really give this game a chance play for a lot of hours and you will get addicted trust me, most of the negative reviews are people with not a lot of game experience, crying survivors mains and crying killer mains. due to game being unbalanced

MY GAME RATING?
9/10

2021.1.8
1.如果野性大衣啥的也送的话，火衣也麻烦送了吧，都是玩家当时辛苦肝的，只送一个显得双标。
2.官方看数据定调的问题还是有点严重，击杀率还是按几杀几跑来看，小丑击杀率垫底所以小丑比军团弱，不守不针对八挂4跑比例＜高配4挂4杀比例所以红段局目前屠夫大战车队水深火热的情况可以接受，只要简化屠夫的上段评分机制屠夫就能开开心心的接受在红段局四跑升段的局面。
3.Py节是萌新好不容易有新鲜血液能多肝点血点传承角色留在坑里玩的机会却总有一些恶臭的人选择假py不让挂，假py四杀，烧自私蛋糕自私布丁然后理直气壮的说我虽然烧了自私祭品但我挺配合啊。
4.衡量屠夫强度的不是挂钩次数而是击杀率以及玩家的挫败感（隔壁某6），八挂四跑的走地小丑不如守尸打针对四挂四杀的叮当军团。不区分真的强，有手就能玩的屠夫，以及需要大量练习才能变强的屠夫，以及根本不强，但是对单体很恶心的屠夫，以击杀率为唯一标准进行加强和削弱。
5.不回滚可以在房间里切换屠夫的功能，以及速修大环境走地无力的问题，红段哪个服屠夫基本都能拆房秒排所以不解决，但是为何不认真考虑到底是什么导致了为何红段屠夫少的发生。
6.国服的孤儿太恶臭。




总的来说游戏的创意在当时乃至现在是很有新意的，但是太多的问题导致这游戏的风评急剧恶化。2017年购入游戏，2020年最后一天已经肝帝1500级，留下一些纪念的东西作为个人感想。
2016年看铃椛的护士直播，跟当时的ex讨论，她说她喜欢颜子轩，因为当时不太熟悉steam，而且配置跟不上，就硬云，当时记得最经典的就是铃椛那nb的护士，还有无能狂怒的牛树300圈，以及所有人破坏手让屠夫没钩子挂人。
2017年换了电脑，买了黎明杀机，最开始肝的角色就是大张伟，甚至不想肝了换其他角色肝，也要在老圣所买个破坏手传承，因为我以为破坏手还是拆钩子不复原。
2017年听说杀鸡在上海参展，托了以前考到上大的同学帮我去碰运气看能不能弄到人皇战袍的key。
2018年新年，听说杀鸡有肝的很好看的皮肤（野性大衣）连蒙带忽悠了几个小朋友买了杀鸡陪我一起肝新年硬币，我半个菜逼加2个纯菜逼估计在黄白段送了不少福利，但还是最终肝出了我最想要的野性大衣。
2018年暑期正式回坑玩，也慢慢开始认真玩杀鸡，看付导的视频，自己也在玩，裂片也改版了，可以换很多好看的皮肤，当时最喜欢的是局座的黑猫（红睡衣那套），于是就没日没夜肝，认识了一个老玩比尔（好像当时名字叫内个小谁）的女玩家，当时蹭人家的二黑彩笔车，三个人玩，倒也还挺有意思的，慢慢肝齐了一套黑猫皮肤，最开始肝帝等级涨也应该是那段时间，不过那会儿还没有之后带皮球玩的概念，还是以游戏体验为目标。18年万圣节是参加的第二次代笔活动，肝的角色是汪涵的学徒套和叮当的枯萎套，虽然当时知道叮当很弱，而且我基本不玩屠夫，但是商城里预览就是觉得很帅。

因为有自己的事要忙，逐渐开始不玩杀鸡，有机会也变得只打屠夫，外加国服孤儿太多，也开始只在日韩服单排，年末回来，看到自己游戏时长竟然快3kh了，有感而发，记些东西。

P.S.
1.知道的一个人类玩家老主播，以前一直玩单边，不打屠夫又要以单边人类为理由，小萌以前也是这样，但是她玩了200h屠夫了她就不存在逼逼这逼逼那的情况了，py节期间又要给别人正常py的捣乱，可是在前年有段时间红段凛妹太强没直播效果了，反而偶然的在下播之后蹭到了我俩的玩具车队，然后闲聊说开始用小号找到了py车队py刷了点血点，用小号来直播，我问小萌的时候，她告诉我主播很多时候都是直播台面上和私底下不是一个人，想开就好。

2.说实话，这个游戏，真的能做到专精一个屠夫/玩人类几千小时，总时长一万小时的，一是只有他们才能发现一些屠夫特有的技巧或者特别赖皮的无敌点位，二是这样的人很可能就是我之前说的，说唱学院，以这个游戏为生，没了这游戏啥都不是的人，兔子的头皮斧点位，电锯的极限锯，枪手的极限Z字板隔板拉人，魔王能不完全漏身体滑行飞扑，春木镇的铁丝网围栏能不能射手电救人，阴森棚屋小二层一楼能不能隔栅栏砍人，所有地图空气墙和上下飞落点都要熟悉才能精通的护士，很多都是他们发明发现的，他们在碰到那些以游戏为娱乐的人的时候基本是处于碾压情况的，甚至有些人玩了一两千小时，但是碰到了一个一万小时的护士。但是娱乐玩家的眼里那就是，这个屠夫太强了，需要削，我付钱了我是爹，我们这类人基数大。不区分有手就行得削（老版凛妹）；上千小时练习才强（老版电锯，兔妈，魔王）；和单纯的恶心，速修大环境无力（枪手，小丑）。碰巧又碰到了一个娱乐玩家是主要金主的制作组，于是有了电锯改动，地图模型改动丢不了头皮位斧头，枪手枪射中人了还能滑行一段进板区，卡着，魔王飞扑要完全蓄力才能飞扑。

3.地图的随机性本来是挺有想法的，但是在以竞技性为主的红段却变成了灾难：长窗LT可以稳溜两三圈，无敌房，小白房窗口对着一个长窗LT，拖拉机下面接了个LT，刷了这种地形，会联动的可以稳溜屠夫两三分钟。屠夫大局观上线放弃追他结果赶到一处电机那发现也是这种地形，再加上现在这个新恶咒制裁不了的速修，瞬间就脑溢血了，但是到了人类方，可能这把好地形的板子被路人队友用了，可能青青大草原，不确定性反而成了影响一局游戏很大的因素。

4.忽略人类玩家的学习性，所有新图其实出的时候，为了纸面上逃生率击杀率的好看（杀鸡zzz分析的唯一标准），新的地图板子数量或者地形设计一般都是会偏向于人类更能逃生的理念来设计的，比如老地图逃生率在50%，新地图若按初期逃生者逃生率能达到50%设计，那么到了玩家们熟悉地图后就到了60~70%，随着时间的推移，这张图被慢慢开发，成了人类优势图，但玩家是浮躁的。每次出新地图新屠夫，就是“这个新屠夫怎么这么强”or“这个图跟掩护林有一拼”，反向倒逼设计组设计地图时只能这样设计。

5.屠夫的配件有强有弱，魔王的配件黑心鼠肝老鼠尾巴猫咪内脏反而是最好的道具，枪手除了快换弹空枪cd之外的配件普遍显得杂技，弗莱迪和凛妹配件反而是设计的相当出色的，基本都能用(假板太垃圾了，出血积木和药瓶没用）。对于弗莱迪凛妹，随到啥配件都能用的倒无所谓，对于枪手之类吃配件的屠夫，3张血网点不到一串钥匙就比较脑溢血了，反向加剧对局挫败感。

6.部分玩家总觉得老版弗莱迪好玩，然而老版本弗莱迪七秒才能入梦，不入梦砍不了人，入梦阶段降移速还得靠带积木等配件减少入梦时间或者入梦阶段移速，抱人的时候砍不了没入梦的人可以被挡着挂钩子，唯一的有点就是心跳范围外透视，入梦阶段-50%互动速度，那么问题来了，入梦之后才能和一般走地4.6一样的屠夫为什么会觉得长版区吃不了瘪，需要长时间准备阶段才能发力的屠夫都不兼容于现在的主流速修环境（迈克尔该版本三个人站在一起也只能同时吸一个人的能量）。他们在贴吧或者b站视频评论区发表意见的时候给那会儿没入坑的玩家吹吹逼还行，一些老版本弱的不行屠夫放到现在这个速修大环境真的是脑溢血。娱乐屠夫不兼容竞技环境而且娱乐屠夫能做到的主流屠夫低端局照样能做到甚至能做得更好。逆反最开始讲恶咒改动的一句话“恶咒的改动让一些本不配呆在红段的屠夫回到了他们该在的段位”倒是挺合适的，所有慢节奏屠夫因为恶咒改动回到了下水道，结束了一大波争论，挺好的唯一的缺点可能就是红段屠夫过少或者凛鸣杀鸡。

7.车队以及t1技能的叠加导致对局强度过高。我不知道我当时自己随便鼓捣的报点方法现在有没有人在用，如果你带你的朋友或者萌新入坑，或者玩具车的时候，如果该地图是非室内图的，你可以用钟表报点法给队友报点，[spoiler] 以阴森棚屋为例，大房和白房位置固定，那么你就可以报点时以大房为12点，白房为6点，码头为5点，小二层为9点，“屠夫现在在7点追我，7点四个一的板和z字板我放了，你们先修，不要修成三连。”“夹哥在4点LT板子下放了个夹，你们等会儿去排一下。”“恶咒在8点地图边角的一颗树后面。””地窖在一点草丛里。“”大门在3点和7点。“同样适用的图有奥蒙德，断骨牛舍。 [/spoiler]为什么有些人认为李奶奶夹哥啥的强，因为这些真的是一些对单排特化的屠夫，到了车队红段局，准确的报点加排陷阱会把你大量前期准备工作毁掉，你本应该打断修机时间拿去布置陷阱以期待后期翻盘，结果被准确的报点，或者魂牵给你毁掉，或者人类有很强的大局观，血祭品懂得去消擦刀，人类知道用替人挂一次方法去慢慢磨屠夫的时间，或者人均打击钢筋老人头怀表，乃至一个会高精度报点的人，甚至哈登红齿轮速修队，都可能让这局对局烈度高，而这些zzz也不去了解，毕竟唯一了解的方式是击杀率，逃生率。

8.最近听说大猪和白妹不播了，挺好的，靠一个游戏吃饭的主播吃不饱饭，那就让其他人为爱发电发现屠夫新的技巧以及人类的新无敌点吧，古人有句话，君子不利于危墙之下。如果你是一个好学校的学生，我建议你别玩这游戏了，不值得，如果你是个街溜子，我更不推荐你玩着游戏了，至少csgo啥的游戏，你练了，有收获，有名气，能恰饭。这游戏你练了，zzz看评价和击杀率，我们这个屠夫真的是太厉害啦，给你削了，2kh白花，气不气

RIP HillBilly <3

É um jogo divertido e aterrorizante no inicio, depois você aprende a mecânica e começa a conhecer os bugs e são bugs para fazer inveja em qualquer jogo em beta test, sistema de report contra players não funciona, o suporte do jogo só responde coisa sem sentido com frases de Ctrl+C Ctrl+V. a comunidade do jogo é um lixo que fica procurando desculpas pra ser um babaca in game, os desenvolvedores são preguiçosos, incompetentes, e não faz o que é prometido, lançam um monte de personagens e skins pra fazer os besta comprar e ter um pretexto pra ignorar os bugs, resumindo se você gosta de torrar dinheiro com merda esse jogo é pra você.

помойка с багами, не советую к покупке
upd спустя еще 50 часов игры: на момент написания обзора ^  в игре выдавало кучу ошибок по которым я не мог зайти, чаще всего это ебнутый античит. А самым главным недугом было то, что меня около года не пускало в матчи с друзьями ( я грузился в матч, их грузило совсем в другое ), после эта дичь прошла и претензий к игре не имею, и к покупке советую если нравятся подобного жанра игры.
какашенцая полная ващее

+: fun gameplay, cool-looking designs, get to play characters from your favorite shows/games, kinda terrifying/thrilling(at the start), a lot of things to do/learn
-: a bit imbalanced gameplay-wise, occasional bugs/exploits, long queues for killer(unless it´s evening), toxic members of the community(but every multi-player game has these)

giving it like 9/10 idk, but recommending it

начнем с самого больного
минусы
-ГРАФОН
не,енто жопа,графон херовый даже для времени выхода этой игры
-однообразность контента
в нашем 2019 году,для разрабов придумывать манов,сурвов превращается в рутину,вот почему самый последний контент в этой игре не очень интересен в плане геймплея
плюсы
-сам геймплей
вот енто круто,если вы в детстве гоняли узбеков со двора,или наооборот убегали от них,эта игра вернет вам настольгические чувства,если серьезно,игра в данном плане не плоха,местами неинтересно,но в основном весело
-игра на все времена
спорный пункт,лично для меня он заходит,игра на все времена.Т.е вам не надоест играть в нее,вы всегда будете прокачивать ваш лвл,ранг,будет куда стремится
-контент (как ни странно)
знаю,лицемер,но это одновременно и плюс и минус,бывают крутые главы,с интересными персонажами,а бывают неплохие,за обилие персонажей,кастомизаций,геймплея-лайк
-мало читеров
да,в этой игре читеров действительно немного,и естественно это плюс
вывод:неплохая игра,чтобы скрасить вечер,советую играть только с друзьями
Pretty good job so far.

Not sure if game has changed much since I played it back in 2016/17, but back then it was fun. Community can be a bit of a pain, especially if you play mostly killer. However if you can deal with being called every name in the book then you'll have a blast chopping people up.
